entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 3 except 7 near the Alberta border.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 3 except 7 near the Alberta border. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 16 February 2023
